byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting from Paris; Mohammed Ibrahim from Mogadishu, Somalia; and a local journalist from Nairobi.

abstract: Somalian Pres Sheik Sharif Sheik Ahmed criticizes Kenya's military offensive into his country to root out Islamist rebels, raising questions about how bilateral the military action is.
snippet: President Sheik Sharif Sheik Ahmed called “inappropriate” a military action into his country that Kenya has said is supporting Somalia’s government.
lead_paragraph: President Sheik Sharif Sheik Ahmed called “inappropriate” a military action into his country that Kenya has said is supporting Somalia’s government.

headline.main: Kenyan Offensive Is Not Welcome, Somalia’s President Says
headline.print_headline: Kenyan Offensive Is Not Welcome, Somalia’s President Says
headline.seo: Somalia’s President Says Kenyan Offensive Is Not Welcome
